description.@en: To become strong enough to endure the dark, I must embrace it. With every moment I feed my hunger, the more capable I become. This hunger comes with a price, as all evil boons do. It is a price I am willing to pay again and again.

effect.@en:
To protect yourself, you’ve become something else. Select one threat and its related hunger: Ghoul (human bones), Lycanthrope (human skin) or Vampyre (human blood). Whenever you consume one of these hungers (upon the Historian’s approval), you move three steps up the Damage & Peril Condition Tracks positively while gaining 9 Conflict.

Should you gain 10 or more Conflict during a game session, or when both you and the Historian feel it’s appropriate for the story, you and your belongings shapeshift into one of these threats for twenty-four hours. Refer to its Threat Profile during this time, forgetting who your allies and enemies are. You awaken Unarmed & Incapacitated!, with no memory of what happened.
